plain_english_summary:
# Strategy: Bitcoin Strategy by Derecknielsen (Under Construction)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/6nmjZHlRmBDGdwIpKycU/details

**Complexity**: High (7/10)
**Description**: Updated: 11/8/22
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 6 assets:

• **Stocks**: SPY, MSTR, BITO, BITI, BSV, TBT

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ If :
    ▪ If SPY's current-price is greater than SPY's moving-average-price (200-day):
      - Buy MSTR (100% of portfolio)
    ▪ Else branch:
      - Equal Weight Allocation:
        - If :
          - If BITO's current-price is less than BITO's moving-average-price (15-day):
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - Select the top 1 asset by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) from: BITI, BSV, TBT
          - Else branch:
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - If :
                - If BITO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 59.0:
                  - Buy BITI (100% of portfolio)
                - Else branch:
                  - Buy MSTR (100% of portfolio)
```

## Technical Details
• **Source Platform**: Composer
• **Source ID**: 6nmjZHlRmBDGdwIpKycU
• **Created**: June 25, 2025
• **Slippage Model**: 0.10% per trade
